info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:34PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Luna County through 500 PM MDT... At 433 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Columbus, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
